text: Chris Huntington (born September 22, 1960) is an American rower. He competed in the men's coxed four event at the 1988 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:American male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of the United States Category:Rowers at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:People from Bethesda, Maryland Category:Pan American Games medalists in rowing Category:Pan American Games gold medalists for the United States Category:Rowers at the 1987 Pan American Games
title: Chris Huntington
